Body:
z_final = 2.0
b = np.linspace(0.0, tracer.lens[0].side_angle.to(deg).value, 512)
xx, yy = np.meshgrid(b, b)
pos = np.array([xx, yy]) * deg
conv_ll = ConvergenceMap(tracer.convergencePostBorn2(pos, z=z_final,
    include_gp=False), angle=tracer.lens[0].side_angle)
conv_gp = ConvergenceMap(tracer.convergencePostBorn2(pos, z=z_final,
    include_ll=False), angle=tracer.lens[0].side_angle)
omega_pb2 = OmegaMap(tracer.omegaPostBorn2(pos, z=z_final), angle=tracer.
    lens[0].side_angle)
conv_ll.visualize(colorbar=True)
conv_ll.savefig('convergence_ll.png')
conv_gp.visualize(colorbar=True)
conv_gp.savefig('convergence_gp.png')
omega_pb2.visualize(colorbar=True)
omega_pb2.savefig('omega_pb2.png')
